Title: L'Avventura
Writer: Michelangelo Antonioni (story), Michelangelo Antonioni (screenplay), Elio Bartolini (screenplay), Tonino Guerra (screenplay)
Actors: Gabriele Ferzetti, Monica Vitti, Lea Massari, Dominique Blanchar
Plot: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 6 wins & 8 nominations.
